Convert String to InputStream in Java

Very often, especially when writing tests, you need to pass an InputStream and you want to read the data from a String.

To convert to input stream, the easiest way is first to convert the string to array of bytes, then read from the bytes using ByteArrayInputStream.

Here is an one-liner on how to do that in Java:

1
2
3

InputStream stream = new ByteArrayInputStream("my-data".getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
